
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18705425" title="发布于 2025-02-09 10:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">2025年值得推荐的 8 款 WPF UI 控件库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">今天大姚给大家分享 8 款开源、美观、功能强大、简单易用的WPF UI控件库，希望可以帮助到有需要的同学。</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">WPF介绍</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">WPF 是一个强大的桌面应用程序框架，用于构建具有丰富用户界面的 Windows 应用。它提供了灵活的布局、数据绑定、样式和模板、动画效果等功能，让开发者可以创建出吸引人且交互性强的应用程序。</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">优秀项目和框架精选</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">帮助开发者发现功能强大、性能优越、创新前沿、简单易用的C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架，无论你是寻找灵感、学习新技术、改进代码质量，还是想拓展自己的技术视野，都能为你提供有价值的参考和指导。关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发效率和质量。<strong>坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）</strong>。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit 是一个开源、易于使用、强大的 WPF UI 控件库，旨在帮助开发人员在 C# 和 VB.Net 中实现 Google 的 <span>Material Design 风格的用户界面。该框架提供了一组丰富的控件、样式和效果，使开发人员能够轻松创建现代化、具有吸引力的应用程序。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/MaterialDesignInXAML/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/MaterialDesignInXAML/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247498671&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=3034c3c23ebeb60f83fea60891ba021f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/LpG7T0tZDisSVTvQBxK6Fw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211454064-1125403449.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211519413-1197154746.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211528532-1721033591.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211535143-1620760639.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211545637-993297591.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">HandyControl</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">HandyControl是一套WPF控件库，它几乎重写了所有原生样式，同时包含80余款自定义控件。使用HandyControl你可以轻松地创建一个美观的WPF应用程序，从而大大提高开发效率。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/handyOrg/HandyControl" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/handyOrg/HandyControl</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247493994&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=afaa764eb31c01fc9260673c869cc5e6&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6OcSyquHutFOm5IWcgLLBQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211601231-65085493.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211605606-986456154.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211611905-1344661888.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211618387-2127241663.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211624251-181257843.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">MahApps.Metro</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">MahApps.Metro 是一个开源、免费、Metro风格的 WPF UI 控件库，提供了现代化、平滑和美观的控件和样式，帮助开发人员轻松创建具有现代感的 Windows 桌面应用程序。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/MahApps/MahApps.Metro" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/MahApps/MahApps.Metro</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509687&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=df81259ca4234c064b31920a64bb1337&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/qNmPkyK8D9OQEAp2MXiAzg</span></a></span></li>
<li>使用文档地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mahapps.com/docs/controls" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mahapps.com/docs/controls</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211637891-182512517.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211642071-1528624699.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211647038-978834846.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211652572-362414756.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211658339-12159934.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">WPF UI</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">一款基于Fluent设计风格、开源（MIT License）、现代化的WPF UI控件库，它提供直观的设计、主题、导航和全新的沉浸式控件，全部都是原生且无缝地集成在一起</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/lepoco/wpfui" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/lepoco/wpfui</span></a></span></li>
<li>在线文档：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://wpfui.lepo.co/documentation/getting-started.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://wpfui.lepo.co/documentation/getting-started.html</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247503534&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=30e9087ac8cc34000187f5413f9a36e7&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Q0cGl0Kp--HM2tgRMQDGVw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211711327-1196329628.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211716499-1716168650.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211722297-1679436287.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211727478-777475213.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211732765-781478679.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">ModernWpf</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">ModernWpf是一个开源项目，它为 WPF 提供了一组现代化的控件和主题，使开发人员能够创建具有现代外观的桌面应用程序。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Kinnara/ModernWpf" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Kinnara/ModernWpf</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247502057&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=667ebfc1c8800c7ea0144059d7fa0bda&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/n5FokPPR6Q4Vz8D4Hb0nUw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211745493-2077805668.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211749782-921225300.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211754639-1879824346.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211800411-320886432.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211806642-1826194427.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Panuon.WPF.UI</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Panuon.WPF.UI 是一个适用于定制个性化UI界面的组件库。它能帮助你快速完成样式和控件的UI设计，而不必深入了解WPF的 ControlTemplate 、 Storyboard 等知识。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Panuon/Panuon.WPF.UI" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Panuon/Panuon.WPF.UI</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247494604&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=95084320f0c47f699f3a030949268258&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/nhiJK5ERi0y1mrf6U4ekuw</span></a></span></li>
<li>中文Wiki文档：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Panuon/Panuon.WPF.UI/wiki/Home-zh-CN" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Panuon/Panuon.WPF.UI/wiki/Home-zh-CN</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211820834-1198591612.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211824999-168091242.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211829115-957384942.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">AduSkin</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">AduSkin一款简单漂亮的WPF UI，融合多个开源框架组件，为个人定制的UI，可供学者参考和使用。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/aduskin/AduSkin" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/aduskin/AduSkin</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247492660&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=d76ce75b4c6917719cafb4bce3d54745&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Lt4aSmNqpZTPPQypzyhb5g</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211851551-550939772.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211905298-449562324.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211948927-1517716576.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208211956550-1054591724.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Layui-WPF</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">LayUI-WPF是一个WPF版的Layui前端UI样式库，该控件库参考了Web版本的LayUI风格，利用该控件库可以完成现代化UI客户端程序，让你的客户端看起来更加简洁丰富又不失美感。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Layui-WPF-Team/Layui-WPF" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Layui-WPF-Team/Layui-WPF</span></a></span></li>
<li>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247495286&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=ce9669c68d0a7a7a4c5ef00f17d89a96&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jXCdCa_t_0XVlqLhLmXWWg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208212015034-2031480999.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208212019827-1033976219.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208212026051-921912029.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250208212031474-602872903.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
